title: Discover the Beauty of India Staying at Two Award-Winning Oberoi Hotels
description: Experience the undeniable beauty of the Himalayas and the quaint colonial buildings of Shimla or the striking natural landscape of Chandigarh. This five-night getaway will have you staying in the world's most opulent hotels - The Oberoi Hotels - as you discover the culture, architecture and raw beauty that makes India one of the world’s most unique countries. Includes daily buffet breakfast, one decadent dinner, glass of wine or beer every night, daily yoga sessions and more.

title: Tranquil Himalayan Chalet Escape
description: Escape the city for three nights of tranquillity in the Himalayan Foothills at Suro Treehouse Resort in Shimla. Includes daily breakfasts, nightly dinners, daily high tea and an early check-in and late checkout.
offer_address: Village Suro, P.O. Basha, Off NH 22, After Mahalakshmi Furniture, Thana Bhadol - Jangal Shadyal Road, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh 173215, India

title: Scenic Shimla Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Drinks & One Lunch or Dinner
description:
Perched on a forested hilltop and enveloped by a tranquil charm, The Orchid Shimla overlooks the bustling capital of Himachal Pradesh. Serenaded by stunning vistas of the neighbouring lush green mountains, this beautiful hotel boasts well-appointed rooms, delectable cuisine, top-notch hospitality, and makes for an idyllic retreat. An hour’s drive from Shimla Airport (SLV), the boutique property is a plush escape for both families and couples seeking solace in the lap of the mountains. Boasting a stunning pool, a lavish spa, a gorgeous rooftop restaurant, an all-day dining restaurant, and a kids’ play area, the property is the epitome of mountain luxury.

The Orchid Shimla is the ideal location to experience the best of Himachal Pradesh because it is close to the city's well-known tourist attractions, including Mall Road, as well as the charming Himalayan villages of Kufri, Naldehra, and Fagu. With a perfect blend of modern living and holistic experiences, the hotel is a charming paradise designed to woo your senses.
offer_address: Shimla Bypass, Frood, Sanjauli, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh 171006

title: Serene Shimla Hilltop Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drink
description:
Located on a forested hillside in Shimla, The Orchid Shimla is a serene paradise overlooking the Himalayan capital. Prepare to be amazed by unmatched vistas, stylish rooms and amazing hospitality, making this the ideal abode for mountain lovers. An overnight drive from Delhi and a four-hour journey from Chandigarh will take you right to the heart of this region.  Among the amenities are a spa, sauna, and steam room for you to get that glow you're dreaming of, as well as a kids' play area for the little ones to enjoy, or enjoy delicious delicacies at the Terrace Lounge Bar or Café Vindhyas with a beautiful view of the valley. 

The hotel's prime location gives you easy access to some famous hill station attractions such as Mall Road, Kufri, Mashobra and Fagu. Pack your bags and head to The Orchid Shimla, a serene paradise designed to wow your senses with a perfect blend of modern living and natural experiences.
offer_address: Shimla Bypass, Frood, Sanjauli, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh 171006

title: Tranquil Shimla Hill Station Escape with Daily Breakfast & One Dinner
description: In the quaint and beautiful Shimla stands the new Welcomheritage Elysium Resort Shimla, a proud member of the ITC Hotels family. The resort is a perfect blend of Himalayan architecture and contemporary comfort. Surrounded by tall firs, deodars and oaks, it offers boundless views of the forest and scenic city. Indulge in locally-inspired recipes, enjoy some quiet time while the kids spend the day in the play area, head over to the spa for some relaxing treatments or get the day going at the well-equipped fitness centre. To add to all the fun, excursions can be arranged on demand for adventure seekers.
offer_address: WelcomHeritage Elysium Resort & Spa, near Geeta Mandir, Tutikandi Shimla, HImachal Pradesh 171004 India

title: Grand Opening: Tranquil Shimla Hill Station Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
In the quaint and beautiful Shimla stands the new WelcomHeritage Elysium Resort & Spa, a proud member of the ITC Hotels family. The resort is a perfect blend of Himalayan architecture and contemporary comfort. Surrounded by tall firs, deodars and oaks, it offers boundless views of the forest and scenic city, especially from the greenhouse-inspired rooftop dining area with its 360-degree, panoramic views.

Indulge in locally-inspired recipes, enjoy some quiet time while the kids spend the day in the play area, head over to the spa for some relaxing treatments or get the day going at the well-equipped fitness centre. To add to all the fun, excursions can be arranged on demand for the adventure seekers.
offer_address: WelcomHeritage Elysium Resort & Spa, near Geeta Mandir, Tutikandi Shimla, HImachal Pradesh 171004 India

title: Heritage-Style Shimla Escape at the Base of the Himalayan Foothills with Valley Views & Lavish Indoor Pool
description: Timeless elegance perched in the dramatic Himalayan foothills of Shimla makes this one of India's grandest heritage escapes. Savour exquisite pan-Indian, international and Himachali cuisine at the hotel's restaurant, or enjoy a leisurely afternoon tea in the lounge. Take advantage of a massage treatment at The Oberoi Spa, to revitalise mind, body and spirit or, for those seeking adventure, the hotel offers guided nature walks through the surrounding forest.
offer_address: Chaura Maidan Rd, Nabha, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh 171004, India

vendor_name: Wildflower Hall, An Oberoi Resort, Shimla
title: Himalayan Shimla Mountain Escape with Forest Views, Onsite Spa & Restaurant
description: Experience the grandeur of the Himalayas with a stay at this Oberoi wonder in the picturesque Shimla. This majestic retreat, once the residence of Lord Kitchener, is perched atop a hill with panoramic views of snow-capped peaks and verdant valleys. Explore the surrounding forests, or savour authentic Himachali cuisine at the hotel's elegant restaurant. For ultimate relaxation, retreat to the Oberoi Spa for a rejuvenating treatment inspired by traditional Indian wellness practices.
location_description: Wildflower Hall, An Oberoi Resort, Shimla
